body:
; minim.mdp - used as input into grompp to generate em.tpr
; Parameters describing what to do, when to stop and what to save

;Run Control
integrator	= steep		; Algorithm (steep = steepest descent minimization)
nsteps		= 50000	  	; Maximum number of (minimization) steps to perform
dt			=0.002

; Energy Minimization
emtol		= 500.0  	; Stop minimization when the maximum force < 1000.0 kJ/mol/nm
emstep      = 0.01          ; Energy step size

;Output Control
nstxout                 = 0           ; [steps] freq to write coordinates to trajectory
nstvout                 = 0          ; [steps] freq to write velocities to trajectory
nstfout                 = 0          ; [steps] freq to write forces to trajectory
nstlog                  = 100             ; [steps] freq to write energies to log file
nstenergy               = 100             ; [steps] freq to write energies to energy file
nstxtcout               = 0           ; [steps] freq to write coordinates to xtc trajectory
energygrps              = System        ; group(s) to write to energy file

; Parameters describing how to find the neighbors of each atom and how to calculate the interactions
cutoff-scheme   = Verlet
ns_type		= grid		; Method to determine neighbor list (simple, grid)
nstlist		= 10		; Frequency to update the neighbor list and long range forces
rlist		= 1.0		; Cut-off for making neighbor list (short range forces)
coulombtype	= PME		; Treatment of long range electrostatic interactions

; Van der Waals
vdwtype     = cut-off       ; twin-range cut-off
rvdw		= 1.0		; Short-range Van der Waals cut-off
DispCorr    = EnerPres

;Electrostatics interactions
rcoulomb	= 1.0		; Short-range electrostatic cut-off
fourierspacing          = 0.12          ; [nm] grid spacing for FFT grid when using PME
pme_order               = 4             ; interpolation order for PME, 4 = cubic

; Temperature and pressure coupling are off during EM
tcoupl                  = no
pcoupl                  = no
gen_vel                 = no           ; Generate velocities to start      
constraints             = none          ; Type of constraint algorithm
continuation            = no            ; Do not constrain the starting configuration

pbc		= xy 		; Periodic Boundary Conditions (yes/no)
ewald_geometry  = 3dc

; Non-equilibrium MD stuff
freezegrps    = S 
freezedim     = Y  Y  Y  

; WALLS                
; Number of walls, type, atom types, densities and box-z scale factor for Ewald
nwall                    = 2
wall_type                = 9-3
wall_r_linpot            = -1
wall_atomtype            = OWT3  OWT3
wall_density             = 33.4  33.4
wall_ewald_zfac          = 3

title		= Xyalnase  on cooh-SAM NVT equilibration 
define		= -DPOSRES	; position restrain the protein

; Run parameters
integrator	= md		; leap-frog integrator
nsteps		= 500000		; 2 * 500000 = 1000 ps
dt		= 0.002		; 2 fs

; Output control
nstxout		= 1000		; save coordinates every 2 ps
nstvout		= 1000		; save velocities every 2 ps
nstfout 	=0		; no save force 
nstenergy	= 1000		; save energies every 2 ps
nstlog		= 1000		; update log file every 2 ps
energygrps    = System ;Group(s) to write to energy file

; Bond parameters
continuation	= no		; first dynamics run
constraint_algorithm = lincs	; holonomic constraints 
constraints	= hbonds	; bonds with H-atoms constrained
lincs_iter	= 1		; accuracy of LINCS
lincs_order	= 4		; also related to accuracy

; Neighborsearching
cutoff-scheme   = Verlet
ns_type		= grid		; search neighboring grid cells
nstlist		= 5		; 10 fs
rlist		= 1.0		; short-range neighborlist cutoff (in nm)


; Method for doing Van der Waals
vdw-type      = cut-off
rvdw-switch   = 0.9
rvdw		= 1.0		; short-range van der Waals cutoff (in nm)

; Dispersion correction
DispCorr	= EnerPres	; account for cut-off vdW scheme

; Electrostatics
coulombtype	= PME		; Particle Mesh Ewald for long-range electrostatics
rcoulomb	= 1.0		; short-range electrostatic cutoff (in nm)
; Relative dielectric constant for the medium and the reaction field
epsilon_r                = 1
epsilon_rf               = 1
; Spacing for the PME/PPPM FFT grid
; CHARMM: EWALD recommended spacing: 0.8 A - 1.2 A and 6th Order spline
; (possibly increase pme_order to 6 to match the CHARMM recommendation)
pme_order	= 4		; cubic interpolation
fourierspacing = 0.12		; grid spacing for FFT
ewald_rtol     = 1e-5
ewald_geometry  = 3dc
; FFT grid size, when a value is 0 fourierspacing will be used
;optimize_fft             = yes

; Temperature coupling is on
tcoupl		= Berendsen	; Berendsen thermostat
tc-grps		= Protein SAM_SBM Water_and_ions  ; three coupling groups - more accurate
tau_t		= 0.1	0.1	0.1	; time constant, in ps
ref_t		= 310 	310 	310	; reference temperature, one for each group, in K
; Pressure coupling is off
pcoupl		= no 		; no pressure coupling in NVT
; Periodic boundary conditions
pbc		= xy		; 2-D PBC

; Velocity generation
gen_vel	= yes		; assign velocities from Maxwell distribution
gen_temp	= 310		; temperature for Maxwell distribution
gen_seed	= -1		; generate a random seed
; Non-equilibrium MD stuff
freezegrps    = S
freezedim     = Y  Y  Y

; WALLS                
; Number of walls, type, atom types, densities and box-z scale factor for Ewald
nwall                    = 2
wall_type                = 9-3
wall_r_linpot            = -1
wall_atomtype            = OWT3  OWT3
wall_density             = 33.4  33.4
wall_ewald_zfac          = 3

title		= Cellobiohydrolase on COOH-SAMs MD equilibration 

; Run parameters
integrator	= md		; leap-frog integrator
nsteps		= 150000000	; 2 * 150000000 = 300000 ps, 300 ns
dt		= 0.002		; 2 fs
;comm-mode     = Linear       ; mode for center of mass motion removal

; Output control
nstxout		= 5000		; save coordinates every 20 ps
nstvout		= 5000		; save velocities every 20 ps
nstxtcout	= 5000	
nstenergy	= 5000		; save energies every 20 ps
nstlog		= 5000		; update log file every 20 ps

; Selection of energy groups
energygrps    = System ;Group(s) to write to energy file

; Bond parameters
continuation	= yes		; Restarting after NVT 
constraint_algorithm = lincs	; holonomic constraints, GolP has been tested with lincs only 
constraints	= hbonds	; bonds with H-atoms constrained
lincs_iter	= 1		; accuracy of LINCS
lincs_order	= 4		; also related to accuracy

; Neighborsearching
cutoff-scheme  = Verlet
ns_type		= grid		; search neighboring grid cells
nstlist		= 10		; 20 fs
rlist		= 1.0		; short-range neighborlist cutoff (in nm)
; Periodic boundary conditions
pbc		= xy		; 2-D PBC

; Method for doing Van der Waals
vdw-type      = cut-off
rvdw-switch   = 0.9
rvdw		= 1.0		; short-range van der Waals cutoff (in nm)
; Dispersion correction
DispCorr	= EnerPres	; account for cut-off vdW scheme

; Electrostatics
coulombtype	= PME		; Particle Mesh Ewald for long-range electrostatics
rcoulomb	= 1.1		; short-range electrostatic cutoff (in nm)
pme_order	= 4		; cubic interpolation
fourierspacing	= 0.12		; grid spacing for FFT
ewald_rtol     = 1e-5
ewald_geometry  = 3dc

; FFT grid size, when a value is 0 fourierspacing will be used
;optimize_fft             = yes

; Temperature coupling is on
tcoupl		= Nose-Hoover	; Nose-Hoover thermostat
tc-grps		= Protein SAM_SBM Water_and_ions  ; three coupling groups - more accurate
tau_t		= 0.5	0.5	0.5	; time constant, in ps
ref_t		= 310 	310 	310	; reference temperature, one for each group, in K

; Pressure coupling is off
pcoupl		= no	; Pressure coupling off in NPT

; Velocity generation
gen_vel		= no		; Velocity generation is off 

; Non-equilibrium MD stuff
freezegrps    = S
freezedim     = Y  Y  Y

; WALLS                
; Number of walls, type, atom types, densities and box-z scale factor for Ewald
nwall                    = 2
wall_type                = 9-3
wall_r_linpot            = -1
wall_atomtype            = OWT3  OWT3
wall_density             = 33.4  33.4
wall_ewald_zfac          = 3
